body.name: 40 Piece Silverware Set for 8, Terlulu Stainless Steel Flatware Set, Mirror Polished Cutlery Set Utensil Set, Tableware Include Forks Spoons Knives for Home Restaurant, Beaded Handle, Dishwasher Safe
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 4 hrs 46 mins
features: 【SERVICE FOR 8】 Terlulu 40 piece silverware set for 8 includes 8 dinner forks, 8 dinner spoons, 8 dinner knives, 8 teaspoons, 8 salad/dessert forks in normal size, perfect for most families.

【CLASSIC STYLE WITH BEADED HANDLE DESIGN】 The flatware set features teardrop handles embellished with a beaded border and rounded end. The classic, timeless beaded pattern in the handle border looks like gleaming jewelry, which is gorgeous and can enhance elegance to our table.

【ADD ELEGANCE TO TABLE】This cutlery set is a nice compromise between modern and classic thanks to its sleek, simple beaded design and bright mirror finish. Whether your style is traditional or modern,this flatware will complement your decor and never look dated. The elegant utensil set is perfect for family daily use, parties, family dinner, wedding, hotel, restaurant, formal dinner, etc.

【PROPER WEIGHT AND ERGONOMIC HANDLE】 Nice weight stainless steel silverware set, not flimsy, solid construction and durable, never bend in daily use. The curvature of our silverware handles is designed according to the posture of the hand, and the appropriate weight and perfect balance are added to ensure maximum comfort during use that avoids you feeling tired.

【HEALTHY AND PREMIUM MATERIAL】 This utensil set is made of high quality food grade 18/0 stainless steel without any harmful substances, rust resistance and nickel free, healthy and durable for everyday use, easy clean and dishwasher safe.❤️【LIFETIME SUPPORT】If you have any questions about our silverware set, please contact us and we will solve it for you within 24 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Terlulu 40 Piece Classic Sliverwre Set 40-Piece Silverware Set is our top pick because of its high-quality construction, elegant design, mirror polish and ergonomic handles that make each piece a pleasure to hold. Whether your style is traditional or modern, this flatware will complement your decor and never look dated thanks to its sleek, simple design and bright mirror finish.

Terlulu Classic Silverware Set Features Made of outstanding thick gauge stainless steelRustproof & sturdy to ensure a longtime servicePremium weight offers comfort to use and holdGood mirror finished always keep its gloss persistent and shinyPearled-edge handle design matches well with any style tableware setEasy clean by hand and dishwasher safe to save labor
Terlulu 40 Piece Classic Silverware Set Package includes: 9.05" Dinner Knife x 8 7.64" Dinner Spoon x 8 7.00" Teaspoon x 8 7.64" Dinner Fork x 8 6.89" Salad Fork x 8

Terlulu Elegant Silverware Set Details Mirror Polished Surface&Smooth Edge Mirror polished and smooth surface, no sharp edges or rough points ensure the safety of your lips and hands. A clean, smooth, shiny surface is appropriate for both everyday use and more formal occasions—such as dinner parties, wedding and holiday gatherings. A Classic Beaded Pattern&Ergonomic Handle Elegant style with beautiful pearled-edge handle shape, you can be proud to host an event. It complements any theme and enhance your table at every meal. The curvature of handle, the appropriate weight and perfect balance are added to ensure maximum comfort during use our silverware set that avoids you feel tired. Sturdy&Durable Our silver cutlery set is made of high quality food grade 18/0 stainless steel without any harmful substances, rust resistance and nickel free, healthy and durable for everyday use. Each utensil has a medium weight and thickness makes our flatware not bend under pressure and we think most people will fell comfortable and balanced.

Terlulu Forks Spoons Knives Set Show Forks 4 thin and long tapered tines, wide left tine and an optional notch, curved tines 7.64'' dinner forks are a must on every tables and used for the main course at all formal and informal meals. 6.89'' salad fork is used for vegetables and salads, fruit, dessert. Spoons Smooth round edge, a small shallow bowl shape the 7'' teaspoon can be used for eating cereal and soups, as well as stirring coffee and tea. Larger than a teaspoon, the 7.64'' dinner spoon is also used for eating soups, cereals and desserts. Dinner Knives Moderate sharp serrated blades, rounded tips 9.05" Dinner knife is used to cut and push soft or cooked food such as vegetable, soft meat and bread and is laid on the table at all meals, formal and informal.

Warm Tips About Terlulu Flatware Set Please clean the silverware set after using and dry the pieces for their durability.Please do not use iron wire to scratch the pieces to keep their smooth surface.The silverware set is Dishwasher Safe so you can run it in dishwasher to save your labor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very nice inexpensive silverware
reviews.reviewText: Nice looking, good weight and easy to hold.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great choice for silverware
reviews.reviewText: This is a great choice if you’re looking for quality silverware without the expense. I’ve had this silverware set for about 3 weeks now and I’ve put them through the dishwasher several times and they are still nice and shiny. No tarnishing or rust in sight.They are also very sturdy and have a good weight. The edge of the spoons are a bit sharp at first but I think with continued use they will become more dull. I haven’t had an issue with that. Overall I’m very happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the price, large set, looks good and NO RUST
reviews.reviewText: This is a great set for the price! The utensils come in a box, they are well packaged (each one in individual wrap) which prevents scratches in delivery. The utensils have a good weight and feel to them. I've already put them through many dishwasher cycles (at least 20) and no rust at all! I am very excited about that as that was my main criteria picking the utensils. They are very shiny; the design is a bit simple but works for me

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Value Silverware
reviews.reviewText: These are great pieces of silverware. They are just heavy enough so they do not feel cheap and the sizes of the spoons and forks are just right. They only reason I give it 4 instead of 5 is the base of the utensils are so wide that they do not fit into my dishwasher silverware sorter. If you have wider slots for your utensils in your dishwasher then you have it made. I believe you will love this set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a BEAUTIFUL set of flatware!
reviews.reviewText: We have a seaside rental property that needed new flatware. I was cautious about ordering this item and it was delivered today. It is absolutely beautiful! Heavy - and sturdy feeling. I'm going with the other reviews i carefully perused and taking it on their recommendation that they wash perfectly in the dishwasher. Just wanted to say that for the price of this item -- I am very, very pleased. Now -- as long as the renters don't accidentally put them in the garbage dissposal or somehow some pieces end up in the trash -- we'll be all set. However -- if that does happen -- I can certainly order another set with out much of a loss! Thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very nice set, good quality feels good in hand and nice size. Totally happy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and good price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good weight and very pretty. Feels nice in your hand. It was good to throw out the mis-matched collection accumulated over the years and start fresh with this beautifully designed classic, yet modern sized, silverware.
